author: andreas
content:
Never tried it. It's a "tripod thing" ğŸ™‚

But really, yes, focus stacking would probably be a good way of making use of my new lens, that Mitakon 20mm f/2 4.5X Super Macro Lens. So far I've only tried it once, found that it is terribly dim and focuses no further away than maybe an inch. I didn't use it and just packed it away ğŸ˜„
